attributes.action: create a fair pension system where privileged individuals do not benefit from preferential tax treatment applied to their pension pots.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is iniquitous that MP's and judges do not have the same tax legislation applied to their pension pots as the rest of the general public. Now is the time to show that future "fair for all" by granting the same advantages to everyone or removing them from the favoured few.
